long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly save and manage your favorite YouTube videos, Shorts, and websites with the Bookmark Extension. Whether you're watching an educational video, a memorable clip, or browsing informative articles, this extension makes it easy to bookmark and revisit your preferred content.

Features:

• Easy Bookmarking: Quickly bookmark YouTube videos and Shorts 
  with a single click.

• Automatic Timestamp: Save the exact timestamp of YouTube videos 
  to resume watching from where you left off.

• Website Bookmarks:  Bookmark any website with a favicon for quick 
  visual reference.

• Rename Bookmarks: Customize your bookmark names for better 
  organization.

• Thumbnail Previews: View YouTube thumbnails or website favicons 
  directly in your bookmarks list.

• Organized List:  Keep your bookmarks organized and accessible in a 
   neatly arranged list.

• Remove Bookmarks:  Easily remove bookmarks you no longer need.

• Clear All:  Quickly clear all bookmarks with a single click.
